title: Tesla Inc. stock falls Tuesday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of Tesla Inc. 
        TSLA,
        -2.25%
       shed 3.93% to $180.74 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around dismal trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       falling 1.65% to 15,939.59 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 1.04% to 38,585.19. This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses. Tesla Inc. closed $118.55 short of its 52-week high ($299.29), which the company achieved on July 19th. Trading volume (118.3 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 106.3 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. Despite protests from the bears, the calm is likely to last.
